attributes.comment:
Do not raise our adoption fees any more! Foreign adoptions already cost easily $20,000+. Many of
us have to renew our I-171 H after it expires because the countries we are adopting from do not
process adoptions quickly. Why an extension of this form costs anything is beyond me! We
already pay the current rate of $545 plus the fingerpinting fee of $70 twice! That's $1230 for one
form at the current prices. Do not make it any financially harder for Americans to adopt. There are
enough hoops we have to jump through as is! Thank you for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Gina M. Grgich
